TopicTitle: Thrust Limits, etc., as a Stage OR actuated via toggle

Articles.Content:
Just as the title says.

I like the idea of being able to set an engine's thrust limits in a stage.

E.g. - I have a shuttle...When the solid fuels come off, I want to reduce the thrust limit on the directly vertical thrust to favor the diagonal. So, at launch, an engine is being used at 100%, lets say. Once I engage the stage, I would love for the limit to engage as well rather than having to right click and change myself constantly, especially since there are multiple engines involved.

No, I don't want a shuttle mod. If I wanted that, I would just ask someone to come play the game for me. The fun is in it doing it yourself.
